description:
<h2><span>Registered Nurses - (Staff Bank) </span></h2>
<p><span>The Staff Bank require Qualified Nurses to work in the Medical and Surgical areas of the Trust. Applicants should be a Registered Nurse and understand the importance of the NMC code of conduct. <br /></span><span> <br /> You should have a problem solving approach and be a professional / good role model. You will be able use your own initiative and be able to manage difficult situations as well as having the ability to work under pressure.<br /> <br /> <strong>The hours are varied and flexible. Please note this is not a permanent post.</strong></span></p>
title: Bank Registered Nurses (Acute)
